hero.title: Elegance Redefined
hero.subtitle: Discover exclusive collections that blend timeless style with modern trends.

materials.title: Noble Materials
materials.description: We select only the finest fabrics, from Italian cashmere to Egyptian cotton, for an unparalleled feel and durability.

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.description: Each piece is the result of exceptional craftsmanship, where traditional techniques meet modern design to ensure a perfect finish.

exclusivity.title: Exclusivity
exclusivity.description: Our limited collections and exclusive pieces guarantee you a unique style that sets you apart.

lena.name: Lena S.
lena.quote: Exceptional quality and unparalleled style. EZENTIALS has become my go-to for luxury fashion.

felix.name: Felix K.
felix.quote: Finally, a shop that understands masculine elegance. The cuts are perfect and the materials are very pleasant.

hannah.name: Hannah W.
hannah.quote: I ordered a dress for a gala and received a flood of compliments. The customer service is also very responsive.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your most common questions.

shipping.question: What are the shipping options?
shipping.answer: We offer free standard shipping (3-5 business days) on all orders. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for an additional fee.

returns.question: How can I return an item?
returns.answer: You can return any item free of charge within 30 days of receipt. Please visit our returns portal to start the process.

sizing.question: How do I find my right size?
sizing.answer: Each product page includes a detailed size guide with specific measurements. If you are unsure, do not hesitate to contact our customer service for a personal consultation.

care.question: How do I care for my items?
care.answer: Care instructions are available on the label of each item and in the 'Details & Care' section on the product page. For delicate materials like cashmere or silk, we recommend professional dry cleaning.

contact.question: How can I contact you?
contact.answer: Our customer service team is available by email at ezcentials@gmail.com or through our contact form. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.description: We are here to help. Do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or comments.
contact_page.toast_success_desc: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you soon.

product_page.default_details: Composition: 80% Satin, 20% Silk. Hand wash only. Do not tumble dry.
product_page.shipping_details: Free standard shipping within 3-5 business days. Free returns within 30 days.
product_page.be_the_first_review: Be the first to leave a review for this product!

ai_stylist.title: Your Personal AI Stylist
ai_stylist.description: Describe your style, and we'll curate a custom selection for you, inspired by your browsing habits.
ai_stylist.form_label: What are your current style preferences and desires?
ai_stylist.form_placeholder: e.g., I like a minimalist style, neutral colors, and natural materials like linen and cotton. I'm looking for an outfit for a summer wedding...
ai_stylist.error_message: An error occurred while generating recommendations.
ai_stylist.browsing_history_default: The user has no browsing history.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to EZENTIALS. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website.

data_collected.title: Data We Collect About You
data_collected.content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows: Identity Data, Contact Data, Financial Data, Transaction Data, Technical Data, Profile Data, and Usage Data.

data_usage.title: How We Use Your Personal Data
data_usage.content: We will only use your personal data to provide and improve our services, process your orders, manage your account, personalize your experience on our site, and to communicate with you.

data_sharing.title: Data Sharing
data_sharing.content: We may share your personal data with third parties for specific purposes, such as payment processors and delivery partners. We do not share your data with third parties for marketing purposes without your express consent.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps us to provide you with a good experience when you browse our website and also allows us to improve our site.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorised way, altered or disclosed.

user_rights.title: Your Legal Rights
user_rights.content: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to access, correct, erase, restrict processing, object to processing, and data portability.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@ezentials.com.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide us with information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.

products.title: Products
products.content: We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images of our products that appear at the store. We cannot guarantee that your computer monitor's display of any color will be accurate. All descriptions of products or product pricing are subject to change at any time without notice, at our sole discretion.

payments.title: Payments
payments.content: We reserve the right to refuse any order you place with us. We may, in our sole discretion, limit or cancel quantities purchased per person, per household or per order. In the event that we make a change to or cancel an order, we may attempt to notify you by contacting the e-mail and/or billing address/phone number provided at the time the order was made.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: The Service and its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of EZENTIALS and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the Country and foreign countries.

limitation_of_liability.title: Limitation Of Liability
limitation_of_liability.content: In no event shall EZENTIALS, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Country, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@ezentials.com.

gucci_silk_dress.name: Gucci Ribbon Print Silk Dress
gucci_silk_dress.description: Multicolor silk midi dress with ribbon print, long puff sleeves, tie-neck collar, and back button fastening. 100% silk fabric, fluid and feminine cut.

dior_blazer_dress.name: Dior Wool-Silk Gabardine Blazer Dress
dior_blazer_dress.description: Mid-length blazer dress crafted in wool-silk gabardine. Structured cut, defined shoulders, belted waist. Evokes a very chic professional style.

dior_poplin_dress.name: Dior Cotton/Silk Poplin Belted Dress
dior_poplin_dress.description: Mid-length dress in lightweight cotton and silk poplin, belted cut, long sleeves, clean design. Perfect cocktail of comfort and elegance.

dior_oblique_dress.name: Dior Oblique Pattern Fluid Dress
dior_oblique_dress.description: Lightweight denim dress with Oblique pattern, fluid cut, asymmetrical collar, exclusive Dior fabric.

dior_shirt_dress.name: Dior Black Poplin Shirt Dress
dior_shirt_dress.description: Simple shirt dress in cotton and silk poplin, straight cut, classic collar, long sleeves, minimalist elegance.

dior_tweed_dress.name: Dior Macrocannage Tweed Dress
dior_tweed_dress.description: Short dress in grey tweed with macrocannage pattern, wool and silk blend, straight cut, structured silhouette.

armani_silk_top.name: Armani Silk Top
armani_silk_top.description: Fluid silk top, thin straps, fluid cut, satin finish. Ideal for elegant day-to-night looks.

armani_cotton_shirt.name: Armani Egyptian Cotton Shirt
armani_cotton_shirt.description: Luxury shirt in Egyptian cotton poplin, straight cut, Italian collar, discreet buttons, clean finish.

armani_wool_trousers.name: Giorgio Armani Wool Tailored Trousers
armani_wool_trousers.description: Tailored trousers in virgin wool, cigarette cut, high waist, sharp pleats, comfortable lining.

gucci_premium_jeans.name: Gucci Premium Jeans
gucci_premium_jeans.description: High-end jeans in premium quality denim, slim fit, signature logo or embroidery details, urban-luxe style.

burberry_wool_coat.name: Burberry Long Wool Coat
burberry_wool_coat.description: Trench coat transformed into a long coat, heavy wool, neat lining, classic Burberry cut, practical pockets.

saint_laurent_leather_jacket.name: Saint Laurent Lambskin Leather Jacket
saint_laurent_leather_jacket.description: Biker jacket in smooth lambskin, fitted cut, metal zips, wide collar, rock-chic style.

cucinelli_cashmere_sweater.name: Brunello Cucinelli Cashmere Sweater
cucinelli_cashmere_sweater.description: Ultra-soft sweater in high-end cashmere, slightly oversized cut, luxurious finishes, artisanal knit.

miu_miu_pleated_dress.name: Miu Miu Pleated Dress
miu_miu_pleated_dress.description: Pleated midi dress in lightweight fabric, fluid cut, thin straps, feminine and youthful design.

chloe_muslin_blouse.name: Chloé Muslin Blouse
chloe_muslin_blouse.description: Silk muslin blouse, balloon sleeves, lavallière collar, delicate transparency, bohemian romantic.

valentino_embroidered_dress.name: Valentino Embroidered Tulle Dress
valentino_embroidered_dress.description: Embroidered tulle evening dress, large flowers, flared cut, layers of tulle, very romantic and couture.

burberry_gabardine_trench.name: Burberry Cotton Gabardine Trench
burberry_gabardine_trench.description: Classic trench in cotton gabardine, belted waist, iconic check lining, timeless cut.

bottega_veneta_leather_skirt.name: Bottega Veneta Leather Midi Skirt
bottega_veneta_leather_skirt.description: Midi skirt in supple leather, high waist, straight cut, smooth finish, modern elegance.

prada_silk_jumpsuit.name: Prada Silk Jumpsuit
prada_silk_jumpsuit.description: Fluid silk jumpsuit, thin straps, V-neck, wide leg trousers, unisex chic.

chanel_tweed_vest.name: Chanel Tweed Sleeveless Vest
chanel_tweed_vest.description: Sleeveless tailored vest in tweed, pearl-trimmed edges, patch pockets, enduring “Chanel” chic style.

stella_mccartney_wrap_dress.name: Stella McCartney Crepe Wrap Dress
stella_mccartney_wrap_dress.description: Wrap dress in fluid crepe, tie belt, V-neck, flattering cut, sustainable design.

balmain_luxe_sweatshirt.name: Balmain Luxe Cotton Sweatshirt
balmain_luxe_sweatshirt.description: Sweatshirt with a structured cut, thick cotton, discreet Balmain logo, raglan sleeves, fine ribbed hem.

valentino_silk_tunic.name: Valentino Wild Silk Tunic
valentino_silk_tunic.description: Ample tunic in wild silk, 3/4 sleeves, boat neck, fluid drape, natural elegance.

max_mara_wool_shorts.name: Max Mara Wool Tailored Shorts
max_mara_wool_shorts.description: Tailored shorts in a wool blend, high waist, front pleats, neat hem, perfect for a chic summer look.

oscar_de_la_renta_bustier_dress.name: Oscar de la Renta Embroidered Bustier Gown
oscar_de_la_renta_bustier_dress.description: Bustier ball gown, floral embroidery, full taffeta skirt, glamorous couture cut.

givenchy_satin_shirt.name: Givenchy Satin Shirt
givenchy_satin_shirt.description: Fluid satin shirt, relaxed fit, classic collar, discreet buttons, minimalist chic.

the_row_cashmere_cardigan.name: The Row Fine Cashmere Cardigan
the_row_cashmere_cardigan.description: Luxurious cashmere cardigan, clean cut, mother-of-pearl buttons, discreet and very high-end design.

valentino_palazzo_pants.name: Valentino Silk Palazzo Pants
valentino_palazzo_pants.description: Palazzo pants in lightweight silk, elastic waist, fluid cut, for maximum comfort and elegance.

balenciaga_silk_jersey_tshirt.name: Balenciaga Luxe Silk Jersey T-shirt
balenciaga_silk_jersey_tshirt.description: Oversized t-shirt in silk jersey, round neck, short sleeves, fluid drape, modern “quiet luxury” style.

cucinelli_wool_cape.name: Brunello Cucinelli Wool & Cashmere Cape
cucinelli_wool_cape.description: High-end cape in a wool and cashmere blend, ample cut, invisible pockets, artisanal finish.

ezential_bag.name: 'The Daily' Taurillon Leather Bag
ezential_bag.description: Functional luxury. This shoulder bag in French taurillon leather is as supple as it is durable. Its multiple compartments make it the ideal daily partner.

lumi_clutch.name: 'Jewel' Strass-Covered Minaudière
lumi_clutch.description: More than a bag, a jewel. This rigid minaudière is entirely covered with Swarovski crystals, capturing the light with every movement.

carte_prime_holder.name: 'The Minimalist' Epsom Leather Card Holder
carte_prime_holder.description: The essential, with elegance. Made from Epsom calfskin, known for its resistance, this slim card holder fits into any pocket.

finesse_belt.name: 'The Allure' Lizard Leather Belt
finesse_belt.description: The detail that changes everything. A thin belt in genuine lizard leather, with a discreet buckle in palladium-plated brass. A subtle luxury.

minit_bag.name: 'The Charmer' Kid Suede Micro-Bag
minit_bag.description: The little bag that has it all. Big enough for the essentials (phone, cards, lipstick), this velvety goat leather bag is the perfect evening accessory.

horizon_sunglasses.name: 'Aviator' Titanium and Gold Sunglasses
horizon_sunglasses.description: An icon revisited. Ultra-light frame in Japanese titanium, with 18-carat gold-plated details. Polarized lenses for perfect vision.

nuit_scarf.name: 'Sweet Night' Cashmere and Silk Stole
nuit_scarf.description: A scarf of incredible lightness and softness. The blend of cashmere and silk gives it a fluid drape and delicate warmth.

organize_pouch.name: 'The Nomad' Tech Pouch in Leather
organize_pouch.description: Organize your tech essentials with style. This soft leather pouch is designed to hold your cables, chargers, and other small accessories.

reflet_jewelry_set.name: 'Dewdrop' Topaz Jewelry Set
reflet_jewelry_set.description: A necklace and earrings set of absolute finesse, highlighting pear-cut blue topazes on a white gold setting.

anchor_bracelet.name: 'The Anchor' Braided Leather Bracelet
anchor_bracelet.description: A casual men's jewel. This bracelet is made of braided calfskin and a clasp in the shape of a marine anchor in brushed stainless steel.

etoile_earrings.name: 'Solitaire Diamond' Stud Earrings
etoile_earrings.description: Pure sparkle. Each earring is set with a 0.25 carat diamond, mounted on white gold for maximum brilliance. A timeless classic.

ocean_necklace.name: 'Black Pearl' Tahitian Necklace
ocean_necklace.description: The raw, natural beauty of a Tahitian black pearl, simply suspended from a thin rose gold chain. Each pearl is unique.

sync_watch.name: 'Connected Horizon' Automatic Watch
sync_watch.description: The best of both worlds. A Swiss automatic movement watch, housed in a titanium case with a discreet, integrated notification module.

pluie_chic_umbrella.name: 'The Gentleman' Maple Wood Umbrella
pluie_chic_umbrella.description: Face the rain with panache. A single shaft of maple wood, a wide water-repellent canopy, and a traditional manual opening for this exceptional umbrella.

travel_safe_wallet.name: 'The Globetrotter' Travel Wallet
travel_safe_wallet.description: Organize your journey. Designed to hold a passport, boarding passes, currencies, and credit cards in an elegant leather format.

riviera_hat.name: 'Côte d'Azur' Panama Straw Hat
riviera_hat.description: The quintessential summer accessory. Hand-woven in Ecuador, this Panama straw hat protects from the sun with unparalleled elegance. Grosgrain ribbon.

smart_gloves.name: 'Tactile' Peccary Cashmere-Lined Gloves
smart_gloves.description: Luxury at your fingertips. Made from the very rare peccary leather and lined with cashmere, these gloves are compatible with touch screens.

ceremony_bowtie.name: 'Black Tie' Silk Faille Bow Tie
ceremony_bowtie.description: The essential accessory for evening wear. This self-tie bow tie is cut from a precious black silk faille.

coin_purse.name: 'The Collector' Clasp Coin Purse
coin_purse.description: A retro charm. This soft calfskin coin purse closes with a classic metal clasp. Ideal for your change or your little secrets.

flora_brooch.name: 'Fleur de Lys' Enamel Brooch
flora_brooch.description: A touch of poetry. This brooch, representing a stylized fleur-de-lis, is made using the plique-à-jour enamel technique, reminiscent of stained glass.

luxband_headband.name: 'Muse' Silk Twill Headband
luxband_headband.description: A versatile accessory. To be worn in the hair, around the neck, or tied to your bag, this silk twill headband is printed with an exclusive pattern.

lecteur_glasses.name: 'The Intellectual' Reading Glasses
lecteur_glasses.description: Read with style. Frame in Italian cellulose acetate, with high-quality lenses treated with anti-reflective and anti-blue light coatings.

charme_bag_charm.name: 'The Grimoire' Bag Charm
charme_bag_charm.description: Personalize your bag. This bag charm represents a tiny leather book with brass pages, suspended from a logoed snap hook.

portfolio_laptop_case.name: 'The Minister' Leather Document Holder
portfolio_laptop_case.description: Carry your computer and documents with elegance. This slim document holder in calfskin is lightly padded for optimal protection.

keygold_keychain.name: 'The Guardian' Leather and Brass Keychain
keygold_keychain.description: An everyday object transformed into a jewel. A strap of grained calfskin combined with solid brushed brass pieces.

eclipse_heels.name: 'Vertigo' 105mm Suede Pump
eclipse_heels.description: The quintessential stiletto. A perfect arch and a 10.5 cm heel that endlessly elongates the leg. Made in intense black kid suede.

serenite_sandals.name: 'The Stroll' Flat Leather Sandals
serenite_sandals.description: Minimalist elegance for summer. These flat sandals with thin calfskin straps are the symbol of a casual and timeless chic.

paris_boots.name: 'Rive Gauche' Suede Ankle Boots
paris_boots.description: The perfect everyday ankle boot. A comfortable 6 cm block heel, an elegant almond shape, and supple goat suede. Parisian chic.

diva_mules.name: 'Palazzo' Satin and Crystal Mules
diva_mules.description: For evenings where anything goes. These pointed-toe satin mules are adorned with a spectacular square crystal buckle.

street_luxe_derby.name: 'Avant-Garde' Platform Derbies
street_luxe_derby.description: A classic turned on its head. The traditional derby is mounted on a lugged platform sole in ultra-light micro-rubber, for a bold look.

souverain_oxfords.name: 'The Ambassador' One-Cut Oxford
souverain_oxfords.description: Elegance at its peak. This Oxford shoe is crafted from a single piece of calfskin, a technical feat. Hand-patinated in our workshops.

elite_derby.name: 'The Consul' Buckle Derby
elite_derby.description: An original alternative to the lace-up derby. This single-buckle model (Monk Strap) in grained calfskin is both formal and full of character.

club_loafer.name: 'The Yachtsman' Suede Loafer
club_loafer.description: The ideal companion for sunny weekends. This supple suede loafer is mounted on a rubber-studded sole for unparalleled flexibility and comfort.

tradition_brogues.name: 'Heritage' Full Brogue Oxford
tradition_brogues.description: A pillar of British elegance. This Oxford is distinguished by its decorative perforations ('broguing') all over the shoe. An assertive character.

citadin_boots.name: 'The Urbanite' Chelsea Boot
citadin_boots.description: Versatility and style. A clean shape, smooth calfskin, and sturdy elastic panels make this Chelsea boot an essential in the men's wardrobe.

runway_sneakers.name: 'The Minimalist' Leather Sneakers
runway_sneakers.description: The clean luxury sneaker. Made in Italy from smooth calfskin, its minimalist silhouette matches any outfit, from a suit to jeans.

tom_ford_slim_fit_shirt.name: Tom Ford Slim Fit Shirt
tom_ford_slim_fit_shirt.description: Cotton poplin shirt, slim fit, Italian collar, mother-of-pearl buttons, luxury finish.

ralph_lauren_pique_polo.name: Ralph Lauren Purple Label Piqué Polo
ralph_lauren_pique_polo.description: Soft polo in premium cotton, modern cut, embroidered logo, reinforced collar.

loro_piana_cashmere_turtleneck.name: Loro Piana Cashmere Turtleneck
loro_piana_cashmere_turtleneck.description: 100% Italian cashmere, fine knit, ultra-soft, refined cut.

hugo_boss_round_neck_tshirt.name: Hugo Boss Black Round Neck T-shirt
hugo_boss_round_neck_tshirt.description: Premium T-shirt, mercerized cotton, discreet logo, slim fit.

burberry_stretch_chino_pants.name: Burberry Stretch Chino Pants
burberry_stretch_chino_pants.description: Chino in elasticated cotton, modern cut, discreet check pattern inside.

diesel_slim_fit_jeans.name: Diesel Black Gold Slim Fit Jeans
diesel_slim_fit_jeans.description: Stretch jeans, premium wash, signature metal details.

moncler_nylon_bomber.name: Moncler Nylon Bomber Jacket
moncler_nylon_bomber.description: Lightweight padded jacket, modern cut, logo on the sleeve.

saint_laurent_leather_jacket_men.name: Saint Laurent Leather Jacket
saint_laurent_leather_jacket_men.description: Ultra-soft lambskin, rock cut, YSL silver zip.

giorgio_armani_suit_jacket.name: Giorgio Armani Suit Jacket
giorgio_armani_suit_jacket.description: Jacket in virgin wool, sophisticated cut, silk lining.

zegna_2_piece_suit.name: Zegna 2-piece Suit
zegna_2_piece_suit.description: Italian merino wool, slim fit, natural shoulder.

off_white_hoodie.name: Off-White Hoodie
off_white_hoodie.description: Thick cotton, arrow motifs on the back, signature print.

fear_of_god_essential_tshirt.name: Fear of God Essentials 'Essential' T-shirt
fear_of_god_essential_tshirt.description: Premium cotton, embossed logo, oversized cut.

lacoste_merino_wool_sweater.name: Lacoste Merino Wool Sweater
lacoste_merino_wool_sweater.description: Fine knit, round neck, embroidered crocodile, classic cut.

balenciaga_oversize_shirt.name: Balenciaga Oversize Shirt
balenciaga_oversize_shirt.description: Thick cotton, wide silhouette, discreet branding.

acne_studios_flannel_overshirt.name: Acne Studios Flannel Overshirt
acne_studios_flannel_overshirt.description: Soft flannel, relaxed cut, chest pockets.

stone_island_cargo_shorts.name: Stone Island Cargo Shorts
stone_island_cargo_shorts.description: Durable fabric, Stone Island badge, utility cut.

canada_goose_lightweight_down_jacket.name: Canada Goose Lightweight Down Jacket
canada_goose_lightweight_down_jacket.description: Thermal insulation, windproof fabric, clean design.

the_north_face_expedition_parka.name: The North Face Black Series 'Expedition' Parka

brunello_cucinelli_cashmere_zip_cardigan.name: Brunello Cucinelli Cashmere Zip Cardigan
brunello_cucinelli_cashmere_zip_cardigan.description: Extra-fine cashmere, metal zip, elegant cut.

max_mara_long_wool_coat.name: Max Mara Homme Long Wool Coat
max_mara_long_wool_coat.description: Warm wool, long cut, optional belt.

levis_denim_jacket.name: Levi's Made & Crafted Denim Jacket
levis_denim_jacket.description: Premium denim, classic cut, artisanal finish.

dior_homme_tailored_pants.name: Dior Homme Tailored Pants
dior_homme_tailored_pants.description: Elegant tapered cut, fine wool, couture look.

versace_silk_shirt.name: Versace Silk Shirt
versace_silk_shirt.description: Printed silk, baroque patterns, Italian collar.

palm_angels_printed_hoodie.name: Palm Angels Printed Hoodie
palm_angels_printed_hoodie.description: Thick cotton, palm tree motif, oversized cut.

barbour_quilted_jacket.name: Barbour International Quilted Jacket
barbour_quilted_jacket.description: Diamond quilting, classic cut, velvet collar.

paul_smith_cable_knit_sweater.name: Paul Smith Cable-Knit Sweater
paul_smith_cable_knit_sweater.description: Soft wool, cable-knit pattern, contrasting finish.

givenchy_logo_tshirt.name: Givenchy Logo T-shirt
givenchy_logo_tshirt.description: Embroidered logo, premium cotton, straight cut.
